summary:
Geert (1966) is a civil law notary at the law firm MAES notarissen, specialising in corporate law, real estate, and estate planning. He is also a real estate investment professional and an entrepreneur. An analytical mind, dedicated, forthcoming, accommodating business partner, trusted advisor, team player and problem solver. 

Geert has been a civil law notary and full equity partner at the city law firm Simmons & Simmons and, subsequently, with Stibbe, Amsterdam office. As a notary and trusted advisor, he has advised a large number of companies in various sectors, as well as wealthy individuals and families in their strategic choices, and in implementing them. He has been named one of the “leading individuals” by Legal500, Chambers & Partners, Advocatie and PropertyNL. For what it is worth. Geert started his career in 1992 at Loeff Claeys Verbeke in Amsterdam, the legal predecessor of Loyens & Loeff and Allen & Overy. 

Geert studied law at Leiden University, obtained a master's degree in real estate and investment management (MRE) at the School of Real Estate (ASRE) of the University of Amsterdam and completed the Global Executive MBA programme organised by the five leading business schools in Asia, Europe and the Americas working together, namely: Chinese University of Hong Kong (CUHK); Escola de Administração de Empresas de São Paulo, Fundação Getúlio Vargas (FGV); EGADE Business School, Tecnológico de Monterrey; Rotterdam School of Management (RSM), Erasmus University; and Kenan-Flagler Business School, University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill (UNC).

Geert is a good listener and a result-oriented negotiator. A MAEStro. Streetwise, empathetic, and succinct, he knows how to bring parties together. He has completed the Harvard Law School “Program on Negotiation” and the MfN mediation programme but developed his negotiation and mediation skills based on practical experience handling a large number of varied cases.

Despite all his (semi-)intellectual efforts, he is most proud of the certificate he obtained after succesfully completing a one day Formula 1 driving course at the Paul Ricard Circuit in France.

Geert lives with his significant other and three daughters in The Hague, the global capital of Peace and Justice.

profile_positions.description: We are MAES civil law notaries. We are an independent, full-service law firm for private individuals, companies and (semi) public authorities in the Rotterdam The Hague metropolitan area. Specialising in family law & estate planning, corporate law, and real estate, we guide our clients through the moments that really matter in life, whether their private or business life. We offer serenity, reliability, and security. We deliver customised work, and we also have a low-cost brand, Basisnotarissen Rijnmond, for more affordable customised services. Impeccable, dedicated and with integrity.
profile_positions.title: notaris (civil law notary), business owner

profile_positions.description:
Bloomsbury is a Netherlands based privately owned boutique consulting and investment firm. 

The firm focuses on helping businesses and wealth grow, either by direct investment or through expert consulting services, executive management and pragmatic hands on advice and support.
profile_positions.title: managing director, business owner

profile_positions.description:
Stibbe is a leading and independent Benelux law firm with an internationally oriented practice. Its primary offices are in Amsterdam, Brussels and Luxembourg, with Dutch law branch offices in Dubai, Hong Kong, London and New York.

At Stibbe Geert advised both national and international clients on acquisitions and disposals, joint ventures, private equity, (re)structuring, finance, real estate, capital projects, investments, strategy, corporate, governance and compliance matters. 

Geert draw accolades from competitors, clients and independent surveys alike for his "focused approach and technical know how".
profile_positions.title: notaris (civil law notary), partner

profile_positions.description:
Simmons & Simmons is a worldclass international law firm with offices in 22 locations across Asia, Europe and the Middle East. 

At Simmons Geert advised corporations, investors, development and construction companies, financial institutions, high-net-worth-individuals and their families on their assets with an emphasis on the structuring and financing of all forms of transactions, joint ventures, partnerships, funds, projects, public private partnerships, trust and private client matters, both in the Netherlands and cross border.  

While at Simmons & Simmons, Geert and his team gave this firm a prominent footprint in the Dutch legal and real estate market. He was promoted to a full plateau equity partner, which made him one of the youngest plateau partners within this global firm. He was recommended by Chambers & Partners, Legal500, PLC Global Counsel 3000 and PropertyNL.
profile_positions.title: notaris (civil law notary), partner

profile_positions.description:
Loyens & Loeff is an independent full-service law firm specialised in providing legal and tax advice to enterprises, financial organisations and governments. Loyens & Loeff was created in 2000 through a merger between the tax law firm Loyens & Volkmaars and part of the law firm Loeff Claeys Verbeke.

At Loyens & Loeff (and its predecessor Loeff Claeys Verbeke) Geert specialised in corporate, real estate and finance. He advised (listed) national and foreign companies on a wide range of corporate issues including IPOs, M&A, private equity, corporate governance and corporate structures. He gained broad transaction experience particularly in the field of  acquisitions and disposals, development and infrastructure projects, public private partnerships, finance and private wealth management. Clients included investors, property developers, financial institutions, funds, construction companies, local authorities, trust foundations, charities, high-net-worth-individuals and family offices.
profile_positions.title: Associate Lawyer

volunteer_experiences.description:
Besides the special outdoor experience, the physical effort and mental challenge, Africa Classic gives you the opportunity to contribute to improving health in Africa. For participation you will need to raise a minimum of € 5.000 for Amref Flying Doctors and see the difference that your contribution makes.

Amref Flying Doctors works to improve the health of vulnerable people in Africa because healthy people are better equipped to escape from poverty. As an African organisation, Amref gets its strength from the power of the African population itself.

In 2011, fourteen friends started a fundraiser for ALS, a deadly motor-neurone disease that their friend Weert-Jan Weerts was suffering from. After that first fundraiser, they decided to expand the campaign. Today, the Amsterdam City Swim is an annual event in which thousands of people participate. The foundation wants to raise as much money as possible for ALS research.

The Support Casper campaign is part of and founded by the ‘Stichting Overleven met Alvleesklierkanker’ (translation: Survival with Pancreatic Cancer Foundation). Both have existed since 2015. The founders are all friends or family of people who have died of pancreatic cancer. Unfortunately there is little attention for pancreatic cancer. Presumably because most people die so quickly that there is no time and space to set up actions or ask for attention.

The Support Casper campaign is committed to providing financial support for the much-needed research and development of an effective treatment method by viro-immunotherapy. Casper has put together a team that includes virologists, pediatric oncologists and neurosurgeons from Erasmus MC, Leiden University Medical Center and UMC Utrecht. Together they want to work on methods that no longer focus on the disease, but on the strength of the patient and his ability to use his own body against the malignant tumor. They think it is possible!

Our ambition is to be able to produce effective and affordable medicines for pancreatic cancer patients by 2030, so that they live longer and feel less sick.
